properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 14 at 8:04PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Coastal waters from Ocean Ridge to Deerfield Beach FL out 10 NM...

At 802 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated a strong shower, capable of producing
winds to around 30 knots. This shower was located over Highland
Beach, moving southeast at 5 to 10 knots.

Locations impacted include...
Delray Beach, Gulf Stream, Boca Raton, Highland Beach and Deerfield
Beach.
properties.instruction:
Mariners can expect gusty winds to around 30 knots and locally higher
waves. Boaters should seek safe harbor immediately until this shower passes.

Waterspouts are possible with this activity. Remain on the alert in
case warnings are issued for waterspout development.

Report severe weather to the coast guard or nearest law enforcement
agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service
forecast office.

NWSheadline: STRONG SHOWER APPROACHING THE NEAR-SHORE SOUTHERN WATERS OF PALM BEACH COUNTY
